name: Friday Night Funkin' Chart Editor Save File
summary: An FNFC file is a song chart used by Friday Night Funkin', a rhythm game similar to Dance Dance Revolution. It contains the properties of a playable song chart, which includes the song name and artist, stage, instruments, difficulty level, player and opponent character, and starting BPM (beats per minute). Users can create, open, and edit FNFC files with the Chart Editor (also known as "Debug Menu") included with Friday Night Funkin'.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
